channel.title: GUI on RichardStrnad.ch
channel.description: Recent content in GUI on RichardStrnad.ch

item.title: Cisco ACI – The new and nice GUI way to Upgrade your ACI Fabric
item.description: Some time ago i posted how to do a upgrade of your ACI Fabric through CLI. Cisco made this process now way easier, with some cool new features. In this short guide i used the current ACI release 1.1(1o), that you can grab directly from cisco here. Upload the Firmware to the APIC You can now upload directly through your browser, no longer the need for a SCP/FTP Server!

item.title: Cisco ACI – Restart the GUI (Websocket Error)
item.description: I got some strange Websocket Errors on the Gui Login Page, the following fixed the problem for me 1 2 admin@aci-lab-apic01:~> acidiag restart mgmt {u'dme': {u'output': u'mgmt start/running\n', u'error_code': 0, u'error_string': u''}}
